description: Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.
name: Superior Rune of the Krait

bonuses: +15% bleeding duration; 25% chance when struck to cause bleeding for 10 seconds. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 15s)</c>
+20% bleeding duration; when you use your elite skill you inflict bleeding, torment, and poison for 8 seconds to nearby foes. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 30s)</c>
